meta.description: Maximize the amount of slime produced using two types of beakers with limited resources and waste constraints.

sets.name: BEAKERS
sets.description: Types of beakers used for making slime.

params.name: flour_usage
params.description: Units of flour used by each beaker.

params.name: liquid_usage
params.description: Units of special liquid used by each beaker.

params.name: slime_production
params.description: Units of slime produced by each beaker.

params.name: waste_production
params.description: Units of waste produced by each beaker.

params.name: liquid_available
params.description: Total units of special liquid available.

params.name: waste_limit
params.description: Maximum units of waste that can be produced.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of each type of beaker used.

objective.name: max_slime_production
objective.description: Maximize the total amount of slime produced.

constraints.name: flour_constraint
constraints.description: Total flour used must not exceed available flour.

constraints.name: liquid_constraint
constraints.description: Total special liquid used must not exceed available liquid.

constraints.name: waste_constraint
constraints.description: Total waste produced must not exceed the waste limit.
